Experience Summary

Personally self-taught on other frameworks and using the skills I've learned so far for other passion projects.

Experiences in Fanshawe

Was taught on the front-end with Vue.js, React, and Angular. And in the back-end, I was taught with ASP.NET with C# and Java Spring Beans.

I was able to create a full-stack application and was able to host it on AWS with their EC2 service.

What's this Website's Framework

This website made with Astro, Vue.js, and Tailwind. Currently hosted in Github.

Originally, my portfolio was purely made in React and Tailwind. However, I wanted to try another framework that I haven't tried yet that might be better for my own use case.

I've tried with Gatsby with React for content collections, but found a simplier and better approach with Astro.

Other websites?

I've made a couple of websites with Astro for personal projects and made success with it. Which can be found here...
